BCP.DAO

Class BillDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • BCP.DAO.BillDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BillDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used for retrieving information with regards to bills, their transactions, their payments, and their journals. A list of methods are provided to generate and retrieve such.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BillDAO()
      Initializes a newly created Bill object so that its functions can be accessed

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns true if the address exists.
      static boolean checkHOBills(Bill b)
      Returns true if there are no bills for the current date.
      static boolean checkTotalPaid(Bill b)
      Returns true if the payment is greater than or equal to the bill's total amount.
      static boolean insertBilling(Bill b)
      Inserts values based on the specified block and lotnum.
      static void insertBillingDetails(Bill b, java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> trxs)
      Inserts values based on the specified block and lotnum.

      Inserts values based on the specified bill ID in the transaction journal

      Queries for the list of all homeowner addresses and saves into ArrayList address.

      Queries for the list of all homeowner bills and saves into ArrayList bills.
      static java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> queryBillTrxs(Bill b)
      Queries for the list of transactions based on the specified bill ID and saves into ArrayList trxs.

      Searches the database for the blocknum based on user ID
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryHOAddresses(java.lang.String name)
      Queries for the list of all homeowner addresses based on the specified name and saves into ArrayList addresses.
      static Bill queryHOBillingDate(Bill b)
      Gets the latest bill date based on the blocknum and lotnum parameters.
      static Bill queryHOBillingID(Bill b)
      Gets the most recent bill ID based on the blocknum and lotnum parameters.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Bill> queryHOBills(Bill b)
      Queries for the list of all homeowner bills based on the specified name and saves into ArrayList addresses.
      static int queryLotnum(java.lang.String userID)
      Searches the database for the lotnum based on user ID
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryNames()
      Queries for the list of all homeowner names and user Ids and saves into ArrayList userIDs, ArrayList fname and ArrayList lname.
      static java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> queryTrxMonthlyDues(Bill b, java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> trxs)
      Queries for the list of monthly dues transactions and saves it to ArrayList trxs and adds the amount to the totalDues variable based on the specified parameters.
      static java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> queryTrxRegistrations(Bill b, java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> trxs)
      Queries for the list of registration transactions and saves it to ArrayList trxs and adds the amount to the totalDues variable based on the specified parameters.
      static java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> queryTrxVehicles(Bill b, java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> trxs)
      Queries for the list of vehicle sticker transactions and saves it to ArrayList trxs and adds the amount to the totalDues variable based on the specified parameters.
      static java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> queryTrxViolations(Bill b, java.util.ArrayList<trxReferences> trxs)
      Queries for the list of violation transactions and saves it to ArrayList trxs and adds the amount to the totalDues variable based on the specified parameters.
      static void updatePayment(Bill b)
      Updates the bill's payment status if payment is greater than the bill's total dues based on the billing ID parameter.
